text: Sir Guy Stephen Montague Green, AC, KBE, CVO (born 26 July 1937) is an Australian jurist. A former Chief Justice of the Tasmanian Supreme Court and he was the Governor of Tasmania from 1995 to 2003.Sir Guy Green returns to Hobart, Australian Broadcasting Corporation, 7 August 2003. He was the first Tasmanian-born governor of the state, although not the first Australian-born. He was born in Launceston, Tasmania. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Tasmania Category:Politicians from Launceston, Tasmania
title: Guy Green
